/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. 

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, there's a black car parked, adding a modern element to the scene. On the left side, there's a building with a blue facade, its color contrasting beautifully with the greenery around it. 

The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The sun's rays filter through the trees, creating a lens flare effect that adds a unique charm to the image. Overall, the image beautifully captures the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
